content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map during these operations. Although there were multiple attempts to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5), none succeeded, and the final map state remains without any agent‐placed structures.

ERROR TIPS
• get_entities usage errors
  - Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or passing unexpected positional parameters. Verify the API’s expected signature before calling get_entities.
  
• Lab placement failures
  - Ensure that a Lab is available in the inventory prior to attempting its placement to avoid placement errors.
  
• Iteration over a None value
  - Check that the result from get_entities is a valid iterable (and not None) before applying filters or iteration.
  
• Lab crafting deficiencies
  - Confirm that all prerequisite sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are craftable and present in sufficient quantities. Reassess production chains to meet the full resource requirements for Lab crafting.
